Add a brief section with some info

Category

Kintsugi is the Japanese art of using gold in the repair of a broken item. Rather than disguising the work it is used to enhance the beauty of the piece.

We have several options for Kintsugi inlays: Gold, Silver, Copper etc.

It is also possible to match the Kintsugi to the finish on the legs.

2nd Category

If you're interested in something a bit more subdued, we also offer coloured grout.
